pages.text: $(li)The Golden Carrot is a shiny item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/night_vision)Potion of Night Vision$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)It gives too much saturation when is eaten.
